name: yt-dlx
description: Effortless audio-video download and streaming. yt-dlx does the heavy load for free.

scripts.remake: yarn clean && yarn make && yarn update && yarn build
scripts.postinstall: node util/ffmpeg.mjs && node util/engine.mjs && chmod -R +x util/* && npx puppeteer browsers install chrome
scripts.clean: yarn clean:base && yarn clean:client && yarn clean:deps
scripts.make: yarn make:deps && yarn make:base && yarn make:client && yarn postinstall
scripts.update:client: cd client && yarn install --verbose && yarn upgrade --latest
scripts.build:base: rm -rf shared temp && tsup --config tsup.config.ts && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
scripts.build:client: cd client && rm -rf .next temp && yarn build
scripts.test: yarn test:scrape && yarn test:full && yarn test:cli
scripts.test:cli: yarn link && yt version && yt-dlx audio-lowest --query 'PERSONAL BY PLAZA' && yt-dlx al --query 'SuaeRys5tTc' && yarn unlink
scripts.test:scrape: rm -rf temp others && tsup --config tsup.config.ts core --outDir temp && node temp/__tests__/scrape.spec.js
scripts.test:full: rm -rf temp others && tsup --config tsup.config.ts core --outDir temp && node temp/__tests__/runner.js
scripts.test:audio: rm -rf temp others && tsup --config tsup.config.ts core --outDir temp && node temp/__tests__/audio.js
scripts.test:video: `rm -rf temp others && tsup --config tsup.config.ts core --outDir temp && node temp/__tests__/video.js
scripts.test:mix: rm -rf temp others && tsup --config tsup.config.ts core --outDir temp && node temp/__tests__/mix.js
scripts.test:spec: rm -rf temp others && tsup --config tsup.config.ts core --outDir temp && node temp/quick.spec.js
